participant_1.background:
I enjoy creating beautiful wedding cakes for people to enjoy on their special day.
I like to go to YouTube to watch funny videos with my nephews.
I was a personal chef before I started my own meatloaf catering business.
I do yoga with my dog in the park every morning before work.
my favorite author is stephen king.

I just finished walking my dog, and now I'm getting ready to start studying.
i also eat too much french fries.
I do arts and crafts to keep my mind sharp and active.
i do not like the beach.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
Hello! It's going well, thanks for asking! How is yours going?
It's going great! I just finished making a wedding cake for a client.
Wow, that sounds amazing! I bet it's beautiful!
Thank you! I think it turned out pretty well. I'm a wedding cake decorator.
That's really cool! I love watching cooking shows and baking competitions. I'm not very good at it myself, though.
It's definitely not as easy as it looks! I've been doing it for a few years now and I'm still learning new things all the time.
I'm sure you're great at it! What's your favorite part of the process?
I love seeing the finished product and knowing that I made something that someone will love and enjoy on their special day.
That's such a great feeling! I bet it's really rewarding.
It is! I love making people happy.
That's awesome! I'm sure you make a lot of people happy with your cakes.
Thank you! I try my best.
Well, it sounds like you're doing a great job!
